inclusion.criterion: Stroke patients both ischemic and hemorrhagic with upper limb weakness within 48 hours
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients willing to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with Glasgow coma scale of <7
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients having previous history of shoulder injury
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients having previous history of shoulder pain
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any previous history of skin allergy to tape
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. He has no other medical condition.
